-- | Identify a persons gender by their first name
--   
--   This is a Haskell port of JÃ¶rg Michael's gender.c/nam_dict gender
--   identification library.
@package gender
@version 0.1.1.0


module Language.Gender
data Gender
Female :: Gender
MostlyFemale :: Gender
Male :: Gender
MostlyMale :: Gender
Unisex :: Gender

-- | Loads the default dictionary file from disk
defaultDictionary :: IO [(Text, Gender)]

-- | Default dictionary file: $datadir/nam_dict.txt
defaultDictionaryFile :: IO FilePath

-- | Parses Text with the nam_dict format into a lookup table.
parseDictionary :: Text -> [(Text, Gender)]

-- | Runs parseDictionary from a FilePath
parseDictionaryFile :: FilePath -> IO [(Text, Gender)]
